com.TraderLight.DayTrader.StockTrader

Class Stock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.TraderLight.DayTrader.StockTrader.Stock

  • public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the stocks that we will be trading in a trading sessions.
    Author:
    Mario Visco

      • populateStock

        public static void populateStock(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method populate listOfStocks with all the stocks tracked during the trading session.

        It uses an xml configuration file located in the project root as a descriptor for the all the tracked stocks. For each stock in the XML file it creates a stock object and adds it to the List. Normally gets called by main() to get all the tracked stocks for the trading session in the list.

        Parameters:
        XML - File Name

      • updateStock

        public static void updateStock(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method update listOfStocks to drive potential actions executed manually by the trader.

        It uses an xml configuration file located in the project root as a descriptor for the all the tracked stocks. For each stock in the listOfStocks update its parameters. It gets called by main() every second.

        Parameters:
        XML - File Name
